WRITING.TITLE: moms who don't work
WRITING.TEXT:
i know this is a little off topic but i just wanted to know what you thought about it.
My sister has a 4 month old if you remember my last post. she is always saying that she's so tired and being a stay at home mom is so hard and my jobs no that hard. Always saying i don't know what its like to be tired she is living with my mom well she's pregnant and looks after her 4 month old i have seen what she does all day.
She sits playing on the laptop ,smokes in the kitchen, watches bad talk shows and ghost shows. Then she has a nap or two. Takes a bath then makes a few bottles.
no your not working harder then me i go to school and i work as a nutritionist in an office with lots of clients and co-workers.
I'm sorry being a stay at home mom is NOT a hard job.

WRITING.TITLE: Family is trying to kill me
WRITING.TEXT: i am deathly allergic to bananas even touching something with banana on it will cause me to stop breathing. i am currently staying with my family for the last few months but my family doesn't seem to care i have allergies they give my 6 year old brother bananas, juice with bananas and he just runs around and touches everything. My mother keeps them in the fridge with everything saying they help her when she has a headache she yelled at me that she hates headache i yelled at her i hate to be dead. Now my sister is feeding her 4 month old bananas i kiss that baby. they don't let me know that it happening because they dont want to upset me. OH the best part we live 2 hours from a hospital so if something happened i will die and epipens only last for so long.
